meanings.definition: A genre of television programming that combines documentary and drama elements.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching docudramas about historical events.
meanings.sent2: Many people find docudramas to be an engaging way to learn about real-life stories.
meanings.sent3: The docudramas on TV last night were so interesting, they made me forget about everything else.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a series of docudramas, with unexpected twists and turns at every corner.
meanings.sent5: The docudramas painted a vivid picture of the past, bringing history to life before my eyes.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'docudrama'.
meanings.sent1: We watched two docudramas back-to-back last night.
meanings.sent2: The docudramas we saw were both informative and entertaining.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally stumbled upon a collection of docudramas in the library and ended up spending hours there.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were filled with docudramas, each one telling a different story.
meanings.sent5: The docudramas on the shelf beckoned to be explored, promising a journey through real-life tales.
